meanings.sent1: The toast was the jammiest part of the breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The cake was the jammiest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally sat on the jammiest chair in the room.
meanings.sent4: The jammiest donut in the box was quickly snatched up.
meanings.sent5: The jammiest strawberries were used to make the delicious jam.

meanings.sent1: He felt like the jammiest person alive after winning the lottery.
meanings.sent2: She considered herself the jammiest when everything went smoothly.
meanings.sent3: Finding a parking spot right in front of the store made her feel jammiest.
meanings.sent4: Being born into a loving family was the jammiest start to life.
meanings.sent5: The jammiest moment was when he found his lost wallet with all the money inside.

meanings.definition: Being the most desirable or attractive option
meanings.sent1: The jammiest choice for dinner was the famous restaurant downtown.
meanings.sent2: The jammiest outfit for the party was the sparkly dress.
meanings.sent3: She picked the jammiest spot on the beach to set up her umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The jammiest job offer came from the top company in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The jammiest vacation destination turned out to be a hidden gem in the mountains.
